descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Yin Yang Watch Face is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
Awesome colors and beautiful design are just two of all the amazing characteristics of our latest Watch Face. Download now and enjoy Yin Yang Watch Face.
How to setup Yin Yang Watch Face:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Yin Yang Watch Face.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Yin Yang Watch Face app settings menu.
Yin Yang Watch Face is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: An eye catcher when searching for new watch faces but once installed it's even better.  Elegant simple sophisticated....Thanks
Loved it !! Loved it instantly as it installed on LG G Watch !! How do I change themes, it shows only colour option. Waiting for date feature. Superb !!
Muhammad Rafique Great app, i love it.
